goal.en: This course aims to train students with profound knowledge using simulation to understand and learn a model. Furthermore, this course illustrates real applications using the above techniques in various disciplines.
goal.ch: This course aims to train students with profound knowledge using simulation to understand and learn a model. Furthermore, this course illustrates real applications using the above techniques in various disciplines.

content.en:
1. Introduction
2. Random numbers
3. Generating discrete random variables
4. Generating continuous random variables
5. The multivariate normal distribution.
6. Statistical analysis of simulated data
7. Variance reduction techniques
8. Statistical validation techniques
9. Markov chain Monte Carlo methods
